text: The Place Beyond the Pines is a 2012 American crime drama movie. It was directed by Derek Cianfrance and it was produced by Lynette Howell, Sidney Kimmel, Alex Orlovsky, and Jamie Patricof. The movie got positive reviews from critics. It has a 80% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. Kevin Jagernauth of Indiewire gave a positive review and said that it was a "ambitious epic that is cut from some of the same thematic tissue as Cianfrance's previous film, but expands the scope into a wondrously widescreen tale of fathers, sons and the legacy of sins that are passed down through the generations". == Cast == * Ryan Gosling as Luke Glanton * Bradley Cooper as Avery Cross * Eva Mendes as Romina Gutierrez * Ray Liotta as Peter Deluca * Ben Mendelsohn as Robin Van Der Zee * Rose Byrne as Jennifer Cross * Mahershala Ali as Kofi * Bruce Greenwood as Bill Killcullen * Dane DeHaan as Jason Cankam * Emory Cohen as A. J. Cross * Harris Yulin as Al Cross * Robert Clohessy as Chief Weirzbowski * Olga Merediz as Malena ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2012 crime movies Category:2012 drama movies Category:2010s crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Movies set in the 1990s
title: The Place Beyond the Pines
